engie.title: Energy Pricing Tools and Technical Migration (Opteam & Explore)
engie.description: As a full-stack engineer, I contributed to the development of Opteam and Explore, energy pricing applications. I participated in the migration of the technical stack, enhancing performance and maintainability while optimizing the architecture and training new team members.

obs.title: Development of Abacus: Pricing Tool for the Product and Service Portfolio
obs.description: As a full-stack engineer, I developed features for Abacus, a B2B pricing tool. I contributed to the migration of the technical stack for both front-end and back-end, optimized the application's resilience, and implemented a real-time notification system to track asynchronous processes based on a message bus.

axilum.title: Design and Implementation of an Automated Update System for Medical Robots
axilum.description: As a Full-Stack Engineer at Axilum Robotics, I designed and developed an automated update system for their medical robots. I implemented a web application hosted on Azure to detect connected robots, prepare updates, and manage remote installations. Additionally, I developed a client-side WinForms application (robot) to retrieve and install updates, both online and offline. A SOAP-based web service was created to facilitate communication between the server and the robots. I also led functional prototyping and set up a test environment with two TMS-Robots.

gunnebo.title: NFC and QR Code Communication Integration for Banking Terminals
gunnebo.description: As an Embedded Systems R&D Engineer, I designed and developed C++ libraries to interface RS232 barcode readers with an embedded card running on Windows CE. I also created a cross-platform mobile application enabling seamless NFC and QR code communication between a smartphone and a banking terminal. This project involved prototyping, functional testing, and comprehensive system documentation. Additionally, I managed the technical interface between Gunnebo and its suppliers to ensure smooth integration of their technologies.
